subject: smiling into the camera
body:
1. the book "[a day in the life of abed salama](https://www.amazon.com/Day-Life-Abed-Salama-Jerusalem/dp/1250854970)" which is very good so far

2. woke up to a DM where n sent me a picture of the two of us together some random night out in bloomington a decade ago smiling into the camera, me in a too-tight black blazer over a gray uniqlo dress shirt and her in a classic jean jacket and a butterfly necklace. i'm thankful, after a long fallow stretch after college, for how fulfilling and energizing going out was during that era of my life.

3. getting frustrated at work trying to figure out how to style a checkbox to look and work like the checkbox in the design system but not be as heavy with dependencies as the one in the design system and then feeling grateful that this kind of puzzle is what qualifies as frustrating work for me
